Awareness campaigns may include social media campaigns, educational programs, or events aimed at increasing awareness about sustainable food practices among tourists and food industry professionals.

Such campaigns could include tips, such as how to make sustainable food choices, supporting local farmers and businesses, reducing food waste, and choosing eco-friendly products. Education and awareness campaigns may help tourists make more informed choices when selecting tour operators and restaurants, ultimately encouraging consumers to adopt more sustainable food practices. 

In conclusion, promoting awareness and knowledge of sustainable food practices is crucial to ensure that the food tourism industry can continue to operate sustainably and contribute to protecting the environment, supporting local communities, and promoting responsible tourism.
